description.value: The Character has a small swarm of Mutant Buzzer Squigs that follow them everywhere. As a Free Action, the character can kill them all to absorb their Waaagh! Energy, adding +20 to their next focus Power Test. A New Swarm spawns after 2d5 Days. Whilst accompanied by the Swarm, the Character's Melee Attacks gain the Shocking Quality.
